name: Samurai of the Black Sun
description:
Big evil eclipse in the sky makes evil stuff happen on the ground. Necromancers, the undead, active volcanoes and more.

There's hidden scalability options by pressing CTRL+SHIFT 5, 6, 7, 8  in the gameplay bit that change the resolution scale. Kind of a last minute addition, so no proper menu for them. 

Clicking on the skulls on the main menu map let you choose difficulty. It goes from really easy to regular (default and what you're meant to pick) to very hard.
